name: Namkia Nam
description:
A piece from the collection of characters in the the upcoming graphic novel, Veil Of The Gods. 

This is the avatar of Namkia Nam, a shadowy leader of the Dahasa Resistance. Whilst he’s not the most prominent figure in the Realist Revival Movement he’s certainly the most active. Namkia is said to have coined the slogan, “Say No to Normal”, which has become a central tenet of Dahasa philosophy.
Most people are familiar with his avatar but his actual identity and appearance are hotly debated. Since he first appeared on the scene, a variety of
celebrated philosophers, politicians, religious figures, and entertainers have been accused of being behind Namkia Nam. However, no conclusive proof has ever been presented to support any of those claims.
